text: As an agency, we run into frequent frustrations with the content editors (mainly email, landing page, blog) when more than one person is working at a time. Would it be possible to just lock the content down when someone else is editing, and give the option to override them…. before you’ve made changes and attempt to save

Idea: Allow for a splitting of Label values vs the backend value of a select / multi-select in HubDB columns. I'd like to offer a "Friendly" title for a drop down option that returns ex: and ID for a table, or some formatted / specific version of a text result that is DIFFERENT from what's selected by the user.
and give the option to use .name and .value as  a result.<select_col_name> dictionary so row.<col_api_name> would contain {name: <name>, value: <value>}
